text: In Libya, French President Sarkozy and British Prime Minister Cameron...
...are the first foreign heads of state to visit post - Gadhafi Libya.
In the Philippines, protesters say an increase in mining hurts farmers and poor people.
In Haiti, protesters accuse UN peacekeepers of sexual assault...
...and want them to leave the country.
In Pakistan, a dengue fever outbreak claims 12 lives while thousands of others are ill.
In Romania, low water levels strand 256 ships in the Danube River.
In Japan, 193 companies participate as the Tokyo Game Show opens.
